name: Moons of Zahezia
description:
Moons of Zahezia is a 3D platformer inspired by Mario Galaxy, made for Game Off 2020.

Explore the moons of Zahezia! Meet the squid-like denizens, obtain powerups, fuel, and collectible coins, and make your moonshot! There are 6 planets in all, with two unique asteroids to find! Can you obtain all 95 coins (and spend 10 of them?). How about all 8 fuel? Jump - or MOONSHOT in, and give it a try!

Controls can be found in game, use of a controller is recommended but not required.
